definition: to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
preliminary question/priority problem/issues requiring more immediate attention

sentences.english: The fourth part introduced the precondition of solution to objective incapability of procedure of execution.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分介紹瞭解決客觀執行不能問題的先決條件。

sentences.english: He possessed that will and purpose which are the invariable forerunners of success.
sentences.chinese: 他擁有這種意願和目標，這正是成功不變的先決條件。

sentences.english: A command of information is the necessary prerequisite to the scientific consideration of any subject.
sentences.chinese: 掌握資料是科學地思考任何問題的必要的先決條件。

sentences.english: But his theory of preliminary question is open to question.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯關於先決問題的理論是值得商榷的。

sentences.english: Consequently it is presupposed that the order of succession is accidental.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有先決條件的順序繼承是偶然的。

sentences.english: On the other hand, can you even get into China in the first place?
sentences.chinese: 但另一方面，先決問題是，你進得了中國嗎？

sentences.english: This will cause their prerequisites to be installed, too.
sentences.chinese: 這樣也將安裝這些開發工具的先決條件。

sentences.english: The derivation of generalized variational principles with preconditions by the use of the Lagrange multiplier method.
sentences.chinese: 應用拉氏乘子法推導有先決條件的廣義變分原理。

sentences.english: This integration is a prerequisite of teleradiology .
sentences.chinese: 這種結合是遠程放射學的先決條件。

sentences.english: This assumption then is a necessary prerequisite for our framework to function faultlessly .
sentences.chinese: 這個假設是我們的框架完美地運行其倆的先決條件。

sentences.english: These two things are stipulated for the talks ot resume.
sentences.chinese: 恢復會談所需的兩項先決條件。

sentences.english: Jurisdiction is a prerequisite question of cases on electronic commerce.
sentences.chinese: 管轄權是解決電子商務爭議案件的先決問題。

sentences.english: The dynamic basic position is a pre-requisite for good skiing.
sentences.chinese: 動態的基本位置是優美滑雪的先決條件。

sentences.english: The information on which they make their pre-judgement is likely to be shared information available to everyone.
sentences.chinese: 引起他們先決的信息更容易被他人分享。

sentences.english: We will clearly advise prospective Students on pre-requisites and requirements applicable to the various courses.
sentences.chinese: 院方將清楚地告知學生課程的入學先決條件。

sentences.english: If these prerequisites are met, no further operations are performed.
sentences.chinese: 如果滿足這些先決條件，則不執行進一步的操作。
